solution_line_template: Each chicken lays {eggs_per_chicken_per_day} eggs per day and there are {num_chickens} chickens {eggs_per_chicken_per_day} * {num_chickens} = <<{eggs_per_chicken_per_day}*{num_chickens}={eggs_per_day}>>{eggs_per_day}
He will collect all the eggs after {collection_days} days {eggs_per_day} * {collection_days} = <<{eggs_per_day}*{collection_days}={total_collected_eggs}>>{total_collected_eggs}
